file.name: inputSEGFileName
file.label: SEG file name
file.description: File name of the SEG object.

boolean.name: combineSegments
boolean.label: Combine segments
boolean.description: Combine segments into one output file. This option will cause warnings to be printed on the console in case segments overlap and are overwritten. For now, always split into separate files.

file.name: outputDirName
file.label: Output directory name
file.description: Directory to store individual segments as NRRD files. File names will correspond to the segment numbers.
